drupalNodeEvent.title: Central Review as an Information-Centered Approach to Conceptualizing the Late Imperial Bureaucracy

field_speakers.processed:
Speaker: Maura Dykstra（Assistant Professor, California Institute of Technology）
Moderator: Li Ren-Yuan (Assistant Research Fellow, IHP, Academia Sinica)
Discussants: Tseng, Mei-Fang (Associate Professor, Taipei Medical University), Lawrence Zhang（Associate Professor, School of Humanities and Social Science, Hong Kong University of Science and Technology）

field_description.processed:
The sixth talk of the Qing Law, Institutions and Society series.
The lecture will be conducted in English, and the discussion will be in both English and Mandarin.
Registration is required: https://tinyurl.com/n23nefb9
Contact: Miss Hung, instihp@gmail.com
